refnamediv.refpurpose: locate list of tModel entries matching supplied criteria

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This uddi_find_tModel message is for locating a list of tModel entries that match a set of specific criteria. The response will be a list of abbreviated information about tModels that match the criteria (tModelList).

refsect1.title: Attributes & Children
refsect1.para: The arguments to this call are mutually exclusive except findQualifiers

refsect2.title: maxRows
refsect2.para: This optional integer value allows the requesting program to limit the number of results returned.

refsect2.title: findQualifiers
refsect2.para: This collection of findQualifier elements can be used to alter the default behavior of search functionality.

refsect2.title: name
refsect2.para: This string value represents a partial name. The returned tModelList contains tModelInfo structures for businesses whose name matches the value passed (leftmost match).

refsect2.title: IdentifierBag
refsect2.para: This is a list of business identifier references. The returned tModelList contains tModelInfo structures matching any of the identifiers passed (logical OR).

refsect2.title: categoryBag
refsect2.para: This is a list of category references. The returned tModelList contains tModelInfo structures matching all of the categories passed (logical AND).

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This function returns a tModelList on success. In the event that no matches were located for the specified criteria, an empty tModelList structure will be returned (e.g. will contain zero tModelInfo structures). This signifies zero matches.

In the event of a large number of matches, a UDDI-enabled server may truncate the result set. If this occurs, the tModelList will contain the truncated attribute with the value of this attribute set to true.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: If an error occurs in processing this message, a dispositionReport structure will be returned to the caller in a SOAP Fault. The following error information will be relevant:

row.entry: signifies that the partial name value passed exceeds the maximum name length designated by the UDDI-enabled server.
signifies that more than one mutually exclusive argument was passed.
signifies that one of the findQualifier values passed was invalid.
